name: Save Your Gold
description:
You are a rich goblin, whose peace is being constatnly disturbed by greedy (more greedy than you) racoons. They try to steal your gold, so you have to be faster, and steal theirs instead (by punching them and taking what comes out). Nine levels, various elements, and stuff.

The more gold you save, the more thiefs come into your dungeon; so the more you have, the worse it is.

Done in 41 hours during a Ludum Dare 40 real world gathering in Łódź, Poland (organized by Digital Night Studio).

Credits

  • Jakub Rogalski
